column1: with temp as (select reports_to as employee_id
column4: 0) as average_age from employees where reports_to is not null group by reports_to) select temp.employee_id
column5: employees.name
column7: average_age from temp left join employees on temp.employee_id = employees.employee_id order by temp.employee_id
